plugin.name: Chameleon
plugin.author: KaKaRoTo (Alaoui Youness)
plugin.description: This plugin allows you to change aMSN look and feel using the Tile extension for Tk. This changes the way the toolkit looks so you might have a GTK+ or XP native look instead of Tk. Tile extension must be avalaible before using this plugin, you can get it at http://tktable.sf.net/tile For it to be detected, either install it in your lib directorie, or copy the tile-0.7.2/ directory to this plugin's directory.
